original: Ahlinder, Knut Oskar Sigfrid, postmästare, Kalmar, f. 2/2/88 i Vetlanda av skohandl. C. G. A. o. Hilda Sofia Engdahl. G. 15 m. Karin Elisabeth Andersson. Barn: Karin Birgit f. 18, Märtha Elisabet 23. — E. o. postexp. i ö. distr. 08, bitr. postexp. i Katrineholm 09, i Vetlanda 12, postexp. där 13, i Katrineholm 18, postassist. där 25, förste dito i Boden 31, postmäst. i Ragunda 35, kontr. i Boden 36, postmäst. i Piteå 42, i Trollhättan 44 o. i Kalmar sed. 46. GMnr 8 st.
translated: Ahlinder, Knut Oskar Sigfrid, Postmaster, Kalmar, born February 2nd, 1888 in Vetlanda to shoe dealer C.G.A. and Hilda Sofia Engdahl. Married to Karin Elisabeth Andersson for 15 years, with children Karin Birgit (born 1918) and Märtha Elisabet (born 1923). He began his career as a temporary postal employee in the eastern district in 1908, assistant postal employee in Katrineholm in 1909, in Vetlanda in 1912, postal employee in Vetlanda in 1913, in Katrineholm in 1918, post assistant in Boden in 1925, first assistant in 1931, postmaster in Ragunda in 1935, Controller in Boden in 1936, postmaster in Piteå in 1942, in Trollhättan in 1944, and in Kalmar since 1946. Awarded the GMnr 8 st.
